data.description: A study of dramatic structure and examination of the basic elements of theatrical text. Introduction to applied methods of script analysis as an approach to researching, writing, directing, designing, performing and critiquing plays and screenplays.
data.title: SCRIPT ANALYSIS

data.description: Principles and practice of play direction; motivational analysis, composition, movement, stage business and rehearsal techniques. Student directs a final project.
data.title: FUNDAMENTALS OF DIRECTING
